structure:Code.structure:Description: The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
Population on 1 January of Year X
Births outside marriage in Year X
Deaths under 1 year in Year X
Total fertility rate in Year X
Life expectancy at birth in Year X
dimensionless value other than PC, PCPA and POINTS
Missing value; data exist but were not collected

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Population on 1 January of Year X
Births outside marriage in Year X
Deaths under 1 year in Year X
Total fertility rate in Year X
Life expectancy at birth in Year X
Number of accidents ñ Dangerous substances Involved (H2)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of accidents where dangerous substances are involved (H2)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of accidents ñ Dangerous substances Released (H2)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of accidents where dangerous substances are released (H2)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Accidents - Specific Serious Injury (H1 optional)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of accidents ñ serious injury accidents (H1 optional)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Accidents - Total Significant (H1)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of accidents ñ total of significant accidents (H1)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Date of the accident
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The date when the accident occurred.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Time of the accident
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The time of the day when the accident occurred.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Any textual explanation on the seasonal adjustment method applied
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Any textual explanation on the seasonal adjustment method applied

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Adjustment indicator
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates whether a seasonal adjustment and/or a working day adjustment has been applied

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Method of adjustment
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The method of seasonal adjustment. Used for quarterly data sets only.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Type of adjustment
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The type of seasonal adjustment. Used for quarterly data sets only.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Reporting Airport
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The ICAO code of the reporting airport

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Annual holiday leave
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Annual days of holiday leave excluding days of sick leave

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Annual premiums
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Annual premiums related to profit sharing

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Availability
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates the organisations to which the data can be made available. There will be additional access restrictions within institutions

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Series variation in the domainís context
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Concept to distinguish series variations in the domainís context

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Breaks
structure:Concept.structure:Description: A short description of important breaks and major changes over time in the collection, coverage and compilation of the series. In the case of breaks it is often stated whether old and new data are comparable or not

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Career break
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Total period of career breaks - in months

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Case Number
structure:Concept.structure:Description: A unique case number to identify each record submitted to Eurostat.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Collection indicator
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Explanation on how observations are made (e.g. beginning, middle or end of period), indication of whether data are averages, highest or lowest in period, etc

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Collective pay agreements
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Existence of collective pay agreements covering the majority of employees in the observation unit

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Combined transport
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Possibility of using vehicle for combined transport (Var. A1.1)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Compilation
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Any textual explanation of compilation methods, e.g. weighting, statistical procedures, type of index, etc

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method A
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method A

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method B
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method B

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method A
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method A

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method B
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method B

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Qualifier for confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method A
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Qualifier for confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method A

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Qualifier for confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method B
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Qualifier for confidential marking for first qroup of quantity using measuring method B

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Qualifier for confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method A
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Qualifier for confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method A

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Qualifier for confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method B
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Qualifier for confidential marking for second qroup of quantity using measuring method B

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Qualifier of confidential marking for monetary value
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Qualifier of confidential marking for monetary value

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Contact ñ mode of injury
structure:Concept.structure:Description: This describes how the victim was hurt

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Material agent of Contact - Mode of injury
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The principal material agent associated or linked with the injuring contact.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Container
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Container transport at the point of crossing the Community's external frontier

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Countries crossed in transit (not more than 5) (Var. A2.7)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Countries crossed in transit (not more than 5) (Var. A2.7)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Country in which undertaking is based
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Country in which undertaking is based

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Reporting Country
structure:Concept.structure:Description: 2 first letters of the ICAO code

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Coverage
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Any textual explanation of the coverage, e.g. sample, survey, reporting or non-reporting entities or sectors

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Decimals
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates the number of decimals given for the values of the observations of the series

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Not relevant (ex Terms of delivery)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Transmitted when the threshold indicator is equal to 1

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Material agent of Deviation
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The principal material agent associated or linked with the deviant event.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Deviation
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The last event deviating from normality and leading to the accident.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Flag of authorisation for the dissemination of confidential data
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Flag of authorisation for the dissemination of confidential data

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Distance travelled: actual distance excluding the distance covered by the goods road motor vehicle w
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Distance travelled: actual distance excluding the distance covered by the goods road motor vehicle while being transported by another means of transport (Var. A3.7)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Distance travelled: actual distance excluding the distance covered by the goods road motor vehicle w
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Distance travelled: actual distance excluding the distance covered by the goods road motor vehicle while being transported by another means of transport (Var. A2.5)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Domestic series ids
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Reference codes used in national data bases serving to identify data. Sometimes formulae using reference codes are specified

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Table in Annex
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of Table in Annex A

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Table in Annex

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of Table in Annex G

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of Table in Annex H

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Table in Annex
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of Table in Annex I

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Economic and financial control
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Form of economic and financial control

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Education level
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Highest completed level of education and training

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Employee Coverage
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Coverage relates to the target population

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Employment status
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The employment status of the victim

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Empty cell used for technical reasons
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Empty cell used for technical reasons

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Empty dimension used for technical reasons
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Empty dimension used for technical reasons

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Enterprise size
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Size of enterprise to which the local unit belongs

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Size of enterprise
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The number of employees working at the local unit of the enterprise. (coded)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Entitlement
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Holiday entitlement or number of holidays actually taken

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Reference area
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Reporting Country in ISOALPHA3 code (The country, or geographical/political group of countries that the measured economic phenomenon relates to)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: ESA95 Account
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Stocks/Transaction defined in the European System of Accounts plus some additional codes

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Functional classification of general government expenditure
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Functional classification of general government expenditure

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Classification of individual consumption by purpose
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Classification of individual consumption by purpose

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Frequency
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Frequency of the series (e.g. A, Q, M, D)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Mode of transport at the frontier
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indication of the mode of transport at the external frontier

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Gross weight of goods in tonnes
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Gross weight of goods in tonnes

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Gross Annual Earnings
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Total gross annual earnings in the reference year

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Geographical breakdown
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Code for the geographical breakdown of the partner countries

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Geographical location
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The territorial unit where the accident has occurred.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Gross Hourly Earnings
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Average gross hourly earnings in the representative month

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Gross Monthly Earnings
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Total gross earnings for a representative month

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Government scheme
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Coverage by a government scheme designed to promote employment

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Group size
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Size of the group of enterprises

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Part of body injured
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The part of the body injured.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Type of injury
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The physical consequences for the victim.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Transactions of Tables 6&7 ESA95
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Transaction defined in the European System of Accounts for Tables 6&7

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Internal mode of transport
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indication of the internal mode of transport

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Not relevant (ex Invoiced amount)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicate the invoiced amount when the Member State collects this information (at product level)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Not relevant (ex Invoiced amount confidentiality flag)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Application of confidentiality to the invoiced amount

structure:Concept.structure:Name: KEY_E
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Identification key of the local unit the employee belongs to

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Kind payment
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Annual estimation for payments in kind

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Total kilometres empty
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Total vehicle kilometres during the survey period - empty (including journeys without semi-trailer) (Var. A1.8.2)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Total kilometres loaded
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Total vehicle kilometres during the survey period - loaded (Var. A1.8.1)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: LCI Indicator
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Type of series, such as Total Labour Cost, Wages and Salaries, etc.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Degree of loading of vehicle (in terms of maximum volume of space used during the journey) (Var. A2.
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Degree of loading of vehicle (in terms of maximum volume of space used during the journey) (Var. A2.10)

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Place of loading of the goods (Var. A3.5)

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Place of loading, if any, of the goods road motor vehicle on another means of transport (Var. A2.8)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Legal geographical breakdown
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Code for the legal status of the enterprise or for the geographical breakdown of the partner countries

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Legal geographical breakdown
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Code for the legal status of the enterprise or for the geographical breakdown of the partner countries

structure:Concept.structure:Name: LFS Breakdown
structure:Concept.structure:Description: NACE Rev.1 sections, level of education, employment and unemployment breakdown.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: LFS Indicator
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Type of indicator, such as total employment, unemployment, etc.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: List
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Code corresponding to the list to which the variable - characteristic - belongs

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Days lost
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The number of calendar days the victim is unfit to work due to an accident at work.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Material agent of Specific physical activity
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The tool, object, or instrument being used by the victim.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Maximum permissible laden weight (100 kg) (Var. A1.4).
Economic activity of the employer
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The main ìeconomicî activity of the local unit of the enterprise of the victim.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: National language title
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The full sibling group title that would normally appear in publications (or are otherwise in general use) in the national language of the reporting country

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Quantity confidentiality flag
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Application of confidentiality to net mass

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Quantity expressed in net mass
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicate net mass if the threshold indicator is equal to 1

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Regional Code
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Regional code according to NUTS classification (level 1) in Regulation (EC) no 1059/2003

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Regional Code
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Regional code according to NUTS classification (level 2) in Regulation (EC) no 1059/2003

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Observation comment
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Information explaining an abnormal or missing observation value

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Observation confidentiality
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Information about whether or not the observation can be made known outside the receiving institution

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Observation status
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Infomation on quality of value or an unusual or missing value

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Not relevant (ex Other partner country confidential code)
Other partner country
structure:Concept.structure:Description: GEONOM code of the country of consignment (for imports only)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Paid annual sick
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Annual days of sick leave paid by the employer

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Paid overtime hours
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of overtime hours paid in the reference month

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Paid hours
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of paid hours during the representative month

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Partner Airport
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The ICAO code of the partner airport

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Partner country (real code)
structure:Concept.structure:Description: For imports the country of origin and for exports the country of destination

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Passengers
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of Passengers on cruise passenger excursion

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Number of Passengers
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of Passengers starting and ending and cruise

structure:Concept.structure:Description: "The year of th reported period with format ""YYYY"" (e.g. 2000)"

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Geographical location of the observation unit

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Regular bonus

structure:Concept.structure:Description: The type of the reported table

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Intermodal transport units carried in TEU

structure:Concept.structure:Description: The title of the sibling group in English

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Tonnes x Km effected during the journey (Var. A2.6)

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Code corresponding to the coutnry where the UCI is resident

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Concept to distinguish series variations in a short-term stats context

structure:Concept.structure:Name: STS Indicator
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Type of indicator, such as production, turnover, etc.

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Institution originating STS data-flow to the ECB

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Age of the road motor vehicle (lorry or road tractor) (Var. A1.3)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Occupation of the victim
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The victimís occupation at the time of the accident.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Recovery or Disposal Operation
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Code referring to Annexes of Directive 75/442/EEC

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Weeks Gross Annual Earnings
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Number of weeks to which the gross annual earnings relate

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Vehicle weighting

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Working environment
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The workplace where the accident happened.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Working process
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The main type of work being performed by the victim.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Workstation
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The place/post occupied by the victim at the time of the accident.

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Reference Year
structure:Concept.structure:Description: "The year of the reported period with format ""YYYY"" (e.g. 2003)"

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Unit
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The unit of measure of the reported data

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Unit gross factor
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Grossing-up factor for the local unit

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Indicates the base reference and base value for indices. (Formatting guidelines to be drafted)

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Unit multiplier
structure:Concept.structure:Description: Exponent in base 10 specified so that multiplying the observation numeric values by 10^UNIT_MULT gives a value expressed in the UNIT

structure:Concept.structure:Name: Unit multiplier
structure:Concept.structure:Description: The number of units in which the cell value is measured

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Combined Unit measuring method A for first group

structure:Concept.structure:Description: Place of unloading of the goods (Var. A3.6)
